title: Moon Transit in the 6th House for Cancer Ascendant
summary: The Moon transiting the sixth house brings emotional focus to work routines, health, and problem-solving. Daily responsibilities feel heavier, and mood fluctuations can affect productivity. You may become more sensitive to criticism or workplace dynamics. This phase favors caring for health, organizing tasks, and addressing unresolved issues calmly rather than emotionally.

sections.heading: Career
points: Focus on routine and service work

sections.heading: Finance
points: Expenses related to health or work

closing: This transit demands emotional discipline in daily life. Order and routine turn pressure into progress.
